components.name: Raised Button
components.description: A button component with a high elevation appearance featuring glossy highlights and depth through shadows.

props.name: color
props.description: Custom color for the button. Can be any valid CSS color (hex, rgb, hsl, or named color)

components.name: Metalmorphism Button
components.description: A button with a metallic appearance featuring gradient highlights, reflections, and a colorful glow effect.

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display inside the button

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the component to the HTML tag or custom component of the only child
